basics.name: Firhan Imam Haekal
basics.summary: 2nd Year Masters Student of Brawijaya University

work.name: Indonesia National Research and Innovation Agency (BRIN)
work.position: Data Science and Information Research Center Intern
work.summary: Collaborated with researchers in the agency to create an improved and extended preprocessing method for the Indonesian language using dataset crawled from Twitter
highlights: Developed method speed up processing time by 35x compared to previous research
Developed method speed up training time of models up to 24.93% faster, tested on CNN, MLP, and LSTM

work.name: Information Centric Networking
work.summary: Actively researching NLP Implementation in Network and Security

work.name: Faculty of Computer Science
work.summary: Taught Undergraduate Students on Various Topics of Computer Science

awards.summary: Achieved top 12 National Finalist of Statistika Ria dan Festival Sains Data with Challenge of Developing AI system for Indonesia's law Analysis and synchronization
